title: WHERE WAS DMK’S CONSCIENCE SLUMBERING WHEN SRI LANKAN HUMAN RIGHTS WERE ACTUALLY VIOLATED ASKS TIMES OF INDIA
content: – By Walter Jayawardhana – The Times of India in a hard hitting editorial written on the threat of walk out by the Indian Central government’s coalition ally the DMK on the issue of alleged human rights violations by Sri Lanka questioned where it was slumbering when the violations were actually committed….
